video_prompt: Celestial light streams across the sky, dynamically illuminating a cascading blue glow descending onto a petal-strewn balcony floor. The light shimmers, spreading and interweaving with the petals. Lanterns gently sway, casting shifting glows on blossoming trellises. Wispy clouds drift, and stars twinkle in the dark sky.
image_prompt: A magical, vertical, nocturnal scene on a balcony. Dark twilight sky with scattered stars and wispy clouds. A golden, sparkling celestial stream arches across the sky, transforming into a vibrant, ethereal blue glow cascading towards the balcony railing. On the left, a white wooden swing under a flower-adorned trellis with pink fabric drapes and a glowing lantern. Dark gray balcony floor strewn with pink petals and illuminated by a shimmering blue light path. A classical stone balustrade on the right, behind which a glass vase holds three yellow sunflowers. Dreamlike, enchanting atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Celestial light dynamically streams across the sky, causing a blue glow to cascade and descend onto the balcony. The light shimmers, spreading and interweaving through scattered petals. Lanterns gently sway, casting shifting glows that dance across the trellises. Wispy clouds drift overhead, and stars twinkle throughout the evolving night.
